changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS finance.goal_seq START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1;

changeSet.author: your_name
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE finance.goals ( id INTEGER DEFAULT nextval('finance.goal_seq') PRIMARY KEY, target_amount DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL, start_date DATE NOT NULL, end_date DATE NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_goal_user_email FOREIGN KEY (email) REFERENCES finance.users(email) );
